title: No honor flair
body: I got honor level 3 yesterday, and i had my flair for one game after, and now it doesnt show. Anyone have an idea of why??

replies.body: Keep in mind that in order to get a loading screen flair, you need to be honored by [**1 random teammate or 2 premade teammates**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148). That will enable the flair for the next loading screen.
The flairs last for one game now but if you get honored again it will show back up.
